Hellplague/ Malice:
 
Malice looked a bit confused, but followed Blacknightmare anyway.  Hellplague was waiting in the medical lab, next to a glass chamber with enough room for a bot to stand.  Something about this made Malice uneasy, something he didn't like.
"Come Malice, step in this chamber please.  We will make a copy of you; something that will give us an edge.  A Clone Malice."
Hellplague opened the chamber and motioned for the male to get inside.  He did so with reservation, and stepped inside.  The chamber closed, and Hellplague stepped to the console.  SHe activared the scanners, and began scanning Malice.  The proccess would be slow, and Hellplague stepped over next to her sister.
"Soon, there will be two of him, one for each of us," the femme said, nudging her sister.
 
OOC:  Or so she thinks, heh heh heh heh.

airly2002@... wrote:
BlackNightmare:
 
 
Looking to Malice the femme said "You heard her... let's go see what she wants"
Then
----- Original Message ----- 
From: robert riley 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 2004 8:40 PM
Subject: Re: Unicron's Minions(Repost- repost)


Hellplague:
 
"Yes master, thank you.  I will start the clone then round the other Minions up.  I will distribute battle orders."
The Sweep commander bowed, then left the chamber.  She found Blacknightmare still outside.
"Sister, please bring Malice to the medical lab.  Thn round the others up, keep them together to distribute battle orders."

<DIV>Hellplague/ Malice:</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Malice looked a bit confused, but followed Blacknightmare anyway.  Hellplague was waiting in the medical lab, next to a glass chamber with enough room for a bot to stand.  Something about this made Malice uneasy, something he didn't like.</DIV>
<DIV>"Come Malice, step in this chamber please.  We will make a copy of you; something that will give us an edge.  A Clone Malice."</DIV>
<DIV>Hellplague opened the chamber and motioned for the male to get inside.  He did so with reservation, and stepped inside.  The chamber closed, and Hellplague stepped to the console.  SHe activared the scanners, and began scanning Malice.  The proccess would be slow, and Hellplague stepped over next to her sister.</DIV>
<DIV>"Soon, there will be two of him, one for each of us," the femme said, nudging her sister.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>OOC:  Or so she thinks, heh heh heh heh.<BR><BR><B><I>airly2002@...</I></B> wrote:</DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE class=replbq style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid">
<META content="MSHTML 6.00.2800.1400" name=GENERATOR>
<STYLE></STYLE>

<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>BlackNightmare:</FONT></DIV>
<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>Looking to Malice the femme said "You heard her... let's go see what she wants"</FONT></DIV>
<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>Then</FONT></DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-RIGHT: 0px; PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #000000 2px solid; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0px">
<DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial">----- Original Message ----- </DIV>

<DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial"><B>To:</B> <A title=nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com href="mailto:nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com">nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com</A> </DIV>
<DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial"><B>Sent:</B> Wednesday, July 28, 2004 8:40 PM</DIV>
<DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial"><B>Subject:</B> Re: Unicron's Minions(Repost- repost)</DIV>
<DIV><BR></DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV>Hellplague:</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>"Yes master, thank you.  I will start the clone then round the other Minions up.  I will distribute battle orders."</DIV>
<DIV>The Sweep commander bowed, then left the chamber.  She found Blacknightmare still outside.</DIV>
<DIV>"Sister, please bring Malice to the medical lab.  Thn round the others up, keep them together to distribute battle orders."<BR><BR><B><I>airly2000 <airly2002@...></I></B> wrote:</DIV>
